name: Mickey Mouse (Panorama Screen)
overview: Mickey Mouse is performing a baton trick in Donald's circus. The player must move left and right on the ball and catch all the batons as they fall, while dodging the ﬂaming torches. Mickey gets 1 point for every baton catch. If there are no misses when the player reach 300 points, the game goes into Chance Time and every baton is worth 2 points until a miss. Game B requires more coordination, technique and timing.
